data.name: Crumbling
data.detailed_description:
Crumbling is a VR rogue-like action adventure. Taking control of a Crumbling, a cute little action figure, you fight plastic monsters that are minions of the evil Böse Corp. As you progress from one meticulously crafted diorama to the next your Crumbling grows ever stronger!
Talk to the devs on Discord
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Action-Figure VR

In Crumbling, you control your character directly with your motion controller, as if it was an action figure in your hand. Unwrap your hero from its blister pack, wave it around and smash monsters with powerful attacks!

But observe your foes closely! Only if you anticipate their every move can you avoid their assault. Evade and counter at just the right moment to keep the upper hand in action-packed hack'n'slash combat.

Dioramas

The world of Crumbling is made of meticulously hand-crafted dioramas. Discover the lovingly created toy worlds of Mr. and Mrs Crumble and enjoy all the details. Between the glass covers and the cardboard backdrops you set the stage and put the monsters of Böse Corp. in their place!

Comics

Discover the story of Crumbling through animated and narrated comic books. Learn how the evil Böse Corp. stole all the magic from Mr. and Mrs Crumble in order to make their horrible monster toys come alive. Can you stop them and reclaim the magic? The fate of the Crumble's famous store is in your hands - quite literally!

Work in Progress

Crumbling is still in development. We are a small team trying our best to make action figures come alive and take us back to our childhood. Join us on our quest and support the development of Crumbling. We are happy about your feedback and ideas. Let us know on our Discord Server

data.short_description: Woosh! Bam! Pow! Remember playing with action figures? Put on your VR headset, grab your favorite Crumbling and fight your way through an onslaught of plastic monsters in this unique third-person action rogue-like that brings you right back to your childhood!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 280 equivalent or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-3770 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 equivalent or better
